title: Agrou Misty Wolf

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - During the day, create a fog, obscuring everyone's vision. 2 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When creating fog, for the rest of the day, the player list is hidden, votes are hidden, and players can only place votes based on player number. Whispers are disabled too. Day abilities are also affected.
- The ability has extra details based on the moon of the **previous** night. If, for whatever reason, you create fog day 1, it acts as a new moon.
- New Moon: No special effects.
- Full Moon: Were members know how many votes each player has.
- Hunting Moon: Were members know who everyone has voted.

desc:
